data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD plummets to over two-week low amid resurgent US Dollar demand
data.text: Gold price comes under intense selling pressure on Wednesday and tumbles to over a two-week low during the mid-European session. The XAU/USD is currently placed near the $1,970 area, down around 1.75% for the day, and seems poised to extend its recent pullback from over a one-year high touched last week.

data.title: Surfing the Waves with Gregor Horvat: EURUSD, GBPUSD, WTI, USDMXN, CADJPY, XAUUSD
data.text: In today's advanced ElliottWave analysis, Gregor dives into the five most interesting opportunities for the week ahead! Watch how he analyses #equities, FXMajors, and Commodities and discover how he applies EW principles to come up with his amazing forecasts!

data.title: Gold Bears Are Making Up for Lost Time
data.text: Gold prices on the H4 time frame traded in a bullish trend that lasted until 13th April when a higher top formed at 2048.

data.title: Gold (XAU/USD) Price Under Yield Pressure, Support Level Nears
data.text: The precious metal is testing near-term support as short-dated US Treasury yields press higher.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU Prices Decline on U.S. Dollar's Recovery Amid Rate Hike Speculation
data.text: Bond market volatility and uncertainty over rate cuts are driving the dollar and dimming gold's (XAU) appeal.

data.title: Gold Retracing or Reversing?
data.text: After falling over $50 in the past few days, traders were hoping for a rebound on the yellow metal. However, after breaking through the $2k level, prices have dropped even further.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD drops towards $1,980 as hawkish Fed bias, sour sentiment favors US Dollar
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) bears the burden of the US Dollar rebound as it drops back below $2,000, around $1,990 after renewing its intraday low with $1,987 mark during early Wednesday in Europe.

data.title: Gold Futures: Extra rebound on the cards
data.text: Open interest in gold futures markets rose by just 300 contracts on Tuesday after two daily drops in a row according to preliminary readings from CME Group. Volume, instead, shrank for the second straight session, now by more than 105K contracts.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD to resume its downside journey amid hawkish Fed bets - Confluence Detector
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is demonstrating a sheer contraction in volatility after a recovery move from $1,980.00. The yellow metal is struggling to extend its recovery as the US Dollar Index (DXY) has rebounded firmly after defending the critical support of 101.65.

data.title: Gold Price Dips But This Support Is The Key
data.text: Gold price struggled to clear the $2,050 level against the US Dollar. The price traded as high as $2,048 and recently started a downside correction.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD grinds within bullish channel despite easy United States Treasury yields, Dollar
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) stays defensive around $2,005 amid sluggish Wednesday morning in Asia. In doing so, the XAU/USD bulls reassess the latest catalysts that helped the Gold price snap a two-day downtrend as market sentiment dwindles due to mixed signals and a cautious mood ahead of an important event.

data.title: Gold Prices Gain as US Dollar Falls, Keep a Close Eye on Bearish Engulfing Follow-Through
data.text: Gold prices gained on Tuesday as the US Dollar fell. XAU/USD remains vulnerable to follow-through after a Bearish Engulfing emerged.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD juggles above $2,000, US Dollar softens despite hawkish Fed bets
data.text: Gold price (XAU/USD) is displaying a back-and-forth action around $2,005.00 in the early Asian session. The precious metal has turned sideways after a gradual correction from $2,011.90.

data.title: Gold Has Found Support Above $2000 Aided by the Belief the Fed Will Pause Hikes Soon
data.text: As of 5 PM EST gold futures basis the most active June 2023 contract is up $10.80 and fixed at $2017.80.

data.title: Gold's Near-Term Outlook: Will It Correct Before Moving Higher?
data.text: Gold consolidates near trend highs but could face a bearish move.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD rebounds from the 20-day SMA to $2,010
data.text: Gold price rose $2,011/oz after the beginning of the American session, reaching a fresh daily high. The yellow metal remains near the high, supported by a weaker US Dollar.

data.title: Gold Prices Gain as US Dollar Resumes Drop, XAU/USD Bounces off Channel Support
data.text: Gold regains ground after a subdued performance on Monday, with prices rebounding off channel support near the psychological $2000 level.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast â€“ Gold Continues to Hover
data.text: Gold markets have done very little during the trading session on Tuesday, as we continue to hover above a short-term trendline.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD moves back above $2,000 amid weaker USD, bulls lack conviction
data.text: Gold price regains some positive traction on Tuesday and moves away from a one-and-half-week low, around the $1,981 region touched the previous day. The XAU/USD sticks to its modest intraday gains, around the $2,000 psychological mark, through the first half of the European session, though the intraday uptick lacks bullish conviction.

data.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU Rebounds, but Gains Limited by Fed Rate Hike Bets
data.text: Gold prices firm on weaker US Dollar, China's economic recovery, but uncertainty over Federal Reserve monetary policy limits gains.
